---
title: "Saves vs. Strikeouts"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data(Pitching)
data(Master)
x <- tbl_df(Pitching)
```

```{r}
x %>% select(playerID, yearID, teamID, IPouts, SV, SO) %>% 
  filter(SV>SO, yearID>1977) %>% 
  mutate(IP = round(IPouts/3, 1)) %>%
  inner_join(Master) %>% 
  select(yearID, nameFirst, nameLast, teamID, IP, SO, SV) %>%
  as.data.frame()
```
